name: Chuckie Egg Pop
description:
Harry’s gone on his Easter vacation and Bertha is up to her naughty tricks once again.

She’s found a bubble machine and has stolen all of Harry’s collection of eggs and turning them into giant bubbles! How naughty!

It’s up to you to save Harry’s collection of eggs from Bertha by popping the bubbles and get his stash back for him.

Chuckie Egg Pop! is a special edition Easter themed bubble popping game, and is released totally free with no ads, no ad tracking and no in-app purchases.

Happy Easter-ing from Harry!

Features:

- A Chuckie Egg 2017 Series casual bubble popping game
- Three vibrant themes plus groovy music!
- Featuring cartoon art from the Chuckie Egg 2017 series of games
- Multiple egg-types to collect, and bonuses
- High score and game remembers your progression

Like Harry? Follow him on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/ChuckieEgg2017

And don't forget to check out the Chuckie Egg 2017 series of games on the App Store!
